actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 112-401.

official_title: A bill to reauthorize the America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership in the State of Iowa.
short_title: America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership Reauthorization Act

summary.text: America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership Reauthorization Act - Amends the Omnibus Parks and Public Lands Management Act of 1996 to extend the Secretary of Agriculture's (USDA) authority to make grants or provide assistance to the America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership (Iowa).

titles.title: America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership Reauthorization Act
A bill to reauthorize the America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership in the State of Iowa.
